verbose_text: Although PKM2 might be required for the LPS induced PD-L1 expression in macrophages through a hypoxia inducible factor 1alpha (HIF1alpha)-dependent mechanism, we did not observe a significant change in the LPS induced HIF1alpha protein expression (XREF_FIG) or its interaction with PKM2 (XREF_FIG) in Bmal1 Mye-/- BMDMs compared to control cells.
